SEARCH
Package ru.nsu.gaskov.gradebook

Class GradeBook

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.gaskov.gradebook.GradeBook
public class GradeBook extends Object
Represents a student's grade book, containing information about their grades, study form, and academic performance.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GradeBook(String studentName, StudyForm studyForm)
    Creates a new grade book for a student.
